question_text: Which of the following are characteristics of HDMI? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Carries both audio and video signals
Can be used with DVI through passive adapters
Includes a locking mechanism to prevent removal
correct_answer: Carries both audio and video signals
Can be used with DVI through passive adapters
explanation: HDMI supports digital audio and video, uses a 19-pin Type A connector, and can be passively adapted to DVI, but it does not use packetized video or have a locking latch.
